messages.subject: RE: RE: Square Foot Gardening
messages.msgSnippet: Try 1/2 price books first if you have one in your area!! ... From: Natrlmama@aol.com [mailto:Natrlmama@aol.com] Sent: Wednesday, February 02, 2000 7:53 PM To:
messages.messageBody:
Try 1/2 price books first if you have one in your area!!

-----Original Message-----
From: Natrlmama@... [mailto:Natrlmama@...]
Sent: Wednesday, February 02, 2000 7:53 PM
To: Unschooling-dotcom@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] RE: Square Foot Gardening


From: Natrlmama@...

In a message dated 02/02/2000 1:13:52 AM Pacific Standard Time,
kgale@...
writes:

<<
I went to the Barnes and Noble web page and found the book listed
as Reg price of $16.95, but through the site I can order it for
a 20% discount = $13.56.

Is this a reasonable price??? >>

messages.subject: Re: RE: Square Foot Gardening
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 02/02/2000 1:13:52 AM Pacific Standard Time, kgale@jps.net writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 02/02/2000 1:13:52 AM Pacific Standard Time, kgale@...
writes:

<<
I went to the Barnes and Noble web page and found the book listed
as Reg price of $16.95, but through the site I can order it for
a 20% discount = $13.56.

Is this a reasonable price??? >>
sorry I double clicked the last time and sent that last email without a
response.
Anyhow, I think $13.56 is a good price, except you have to pay $3.95
shipping, so I would wait until they offer a coupon (and I can post it to the
list, I have a
friend who sends me these). Or you could try calling the bookstores in your
area. I know some bookstores regularly offer discounts on all their books.
ps. I didnt' check Amazon, but again you would have shipping charges there
too.
Kathy

messages.subject: RE: Square Foot Gardening
messages.msgSnippet: Hi, I am curious about the regular price for this book. I went to the Barnes and Noble web page and found the book listed as Reg price of $16.95, but through
messages.messageBody:
Hi,

I am curious about the "regular" price for this book.

I went to the Barnes and Noble web page and found the book listed
as Reg price of $16.95, but through the site I can order it for
a 20% discount = $13.56.

Is this a reasonable price??? I already looked in my local
used-book store, but they didn't have it.

Karol
